text: Richard Savage (born 2 December 1960) is an English musician. He is best known for being the bass guitarist and one of the founding members of the English rock band Def Leppard. Savage and lead singer Joe Elliott are the only two remaining original members of the band. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:English rock guitarists Category:Heavy metal musicians Category:English songwriters Category:Musicians from Sheffield Category:Writers from Yorkshire Category:Def Leppard members
title: Rick Savage
